author: mherndon
msg: LUCENENET-400 adding build scripts & tools.  disabling 618 warnings (obselete warnings) in all projects. setting the projects to build inside of build/bin.  The build scripts will create a root level bin folder and put all binaries and xml into that folder. its less messy that way. adding a 'all' solution and build.cmd to the root folder for easier access for people
